data.comment: The match has started, with Sparta kicking-off.
Ryan Gravenberch (Ajax) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 29, At Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel, Daley Blind has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ajax are down to 10 men after Nicolas Tagliafico has been shown a red card.
Ajax make their first substitution with Sergino Dest replacing Zakaria Labyad.
In the minute 38, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Antony Santos.
That's a fine assist from Dusan Tadic.
The first-half has come to a close in Rotterdam.
In the minute 46, It's Ajax with the kick-off after the break.
Danzell Gravenberch is replacing Deroy Duarte for the home team.
The home team have replaced Lennart Thy with Emanuel Emegha. This is the second substitution made today by Henk Fraser.
In the minute 54, Sparta's Michael Heylen has been booked in Rotterdam.
Mica Pinto (Sparta) has received a yellow card from Jochem Kamphuis.
The home team replace Bryan Smeets with Laros Duarte.
In the minute 75, David Neres is on a sub for Antony Santos for Ajax.
Sparta make their fourth substitution with Dirk Abels replacing Abdou Harroui.
The home team replace Mica Pinto with Tom Beugelsdijk.
In the minute 84, Lassina Franck Traore is replacing Quincy Promes for Ajax at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
Jurrien Timber is replacing Noussair Mazraoui for the away team.
Andre Onana for Ajax has been booked by Jochem Kamphuis and receives a first yellow card.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
